story_22_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Ngh... Can’t believe these guys managed to
corner me...
story_22_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Heh! Looks like you don’t have any Pokémon left
that are fit for battle.
story_22_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Your Rockruff was no match for our
powerful Pokémon.
story_22_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Weaklings like you should shut your mouths and
let us do what we want!
story_22_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Don’t make me laugh! There’s no way I’ll let
anyone steal Pokémon away from their Trainers!
story_22_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
I don’t care who it is. I’ll stop anyone who’d do
something so terrible!
story_22_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: Hmph! Tough words for a kid who just lost.
story_22_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
I’m not here to listen to your speeches. All of you
are going to hand over your Pokémon!
story_22_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
We’ll not sit idly by and allow these people to
suffer your wicked deeds!
story_22_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Y’know what? It’s time you packed it in and got
out of here.
story_22_01000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Huh? Who’re you two? You’d better not get in
our way!
story_22_01000/2401_1001_1500_10:
More scrubs who don’t know their place, huh?
We’ll beat you and take your Pokémon, too!
story_22_01000/2401_1001_1600_10:
It seems there are evildoers no matter where
you go.
story_22_01000/2401_1001_1700_10: Avalugg, lend me a bit of your strength!
story_22_01000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Aegislash! Teach these ruffians the sting of the
blade of justice!
story_22_01000/2401_1001_2000_10: Thank you so much! You really saved us!
story_22_01000/2401_1001_2100_10:
’Tis not a deed that requires gratitude. It is our
duty to help those in need.
story_22_01000/2401_1001_2200_10:
Y’know, it’d probably be best to stay away from
suspicious-looking spots.
story_22_01000/2401_1001_2400_10:
Please allow me to express my gratitude. Thank
you, Wikstrom and Wulfric.
story_22_01000/2401_1001_2600_10: I do! My name is Paulo.
story_22_01000/2401_1001_2700_10:
I’ve heard so many stories about the two of you
from Trainers from Kalos. I really look up to the
both of you!
story_22_01000/2401_1001_2800_10:
The strong-as-steel, chivalrous knight who battles
fair and honorably against opponents, Wikstrom!
story_22_01000/2401_1001_2900_10:
The man who’s tough as an iceberg and hot as a
furnace, Wulfric! I’ve heard you’re a kindhearted
man who looks after wounded Pokémon!
story_22_01000/2401_1001_3000_10:
Representatives of the Gym Leaders and Elite Four
of Kalos! It’s an honor to meet you both!
story_22_01000/2401_1001_3100_10:
Haha! Y’know what? Compliments like that make
me feel bashful.
story_22_01000/2401_1001_3200_10:
I am honored that stories of my exploits have
reached your ears.
story_22_01000/2401_1001_3300_10:
Moreover, your courageous acts are truly
the chivalrous deeds befitting a knight.
story_22_01000/2401_1001_3500_10:
No. No way am I good enough to compare to the
two of you...
story_22_01000/2401_1001_3600_10: Oh? What makes you say such a thing?
story_22_01000/2401_1001_3800_10:
Things would’ve gone a lot differently if the two
of you hadn’t shown up when you did.
story_22_01000/2401_1001_3900_10:
You’re not only kind and chivalrous—the two of
you have strength, too, to back it up.
story_22_01000/2401_1001_4000_10:
But I... I might be brave, but I’ve got no strength
to get the job done. I was too weak to even beat
those guys...
story_22_01000/2401_1001_4100_10: At this rate, I’m sure to lose in the PML...
story_22_01000/2401_1001_4200_10: Hm. The strength to enforce what you believe in...
story_22_01000/2401_1001_4400_10:
I’m sure you’ll become a fine Trainer in time.
There’s no need to rush things.
story_22_01000/2401_1001_4700_10:
Wikstrom, Wulfric! Would it be all right to ask you
for something?
